channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI is hiring a new Head of Preparedness to try to predict and mitigate AI's harms
item.description: OpenAI is looking for a new Head of Preparedness who can help it anticipate the potential harms of its models and how they can be abused, in order to guide the company's safety strategy. It comes at the end of a year that's seen OpenAI hit with numerous accusations about ChatGPT's impacts on users' mental health, including a few wrongful death lawsuits. In a post on X about the position, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman acknowledged that the "potential impact of models on mental health was something we saw a preview of in 2025," along with other "real challenges" that have arisen alongside models' capabi...

item.title: That's a crossover we never saw coming - Facebook borrows the Linux scheduler from the Steam Deck to help run its data centers
item.description: Meta is testing a Steam Deck Linux scheduler on servers, betting that latency-driven design scales beyond gaming into production infrastructure.

item.title: Tim Blake Nelson Wrote a Novel About Superhero Actors
item.description: It's called 'Superhero,' based on Nelson's own experiences within the genre, and it's out now for you to read.

item.title: This new MVNO wants to let users pay with crypto - but security scrutiny may mean it never sees the light of day
item.description: Phreeli launches a privacy-oriented MVNO allowing crypto payments, eSIM activation, and unlimited plans, with security focused on compartmentalized data management.

item.title: Heated Rivalry stars teased as Quinn’s latest audio erotica additions
item.description: 'Heated Rivalry' stars Hudson Williams and Connor Storrie teased as Quinn’s latest audio erotica additions

item.title: FaZe Clan’s future is uncertain after influencers depart
item.description: Six influencers recently announced that they are leaving esports group FaZe Clan following unsuccessful contract negotiations with new management.

item.title: 10 impossibly small Japanese laptops under 1Kg that you will probably never be able to buy (unless you fly there)
item.description: Ten impossibly small Japanese laptops under 1kg - but you'll probably never be able to buy.
